content:
# It appears that we encountered an error while trying to insert the remaining iron ore into the furnace. The error message indicates that there are no iron ore units left in our inventory to insert.
# 
# This suggests that we must gather more iron ore before we can continue smelting. Let's go back and find another iron ore patch to gather more resources.

# First, we will locate the nearest iron ore resource patch and move to that location.

iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Move to the iron ore patch.
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Gather 10 units of iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after gathering more iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory again.
